name: Solomon's Special Day
description:
With Solomon's birthday nearing, the tension is high in Purgatory Hall as they scrambled about their final party preparations. However, Luke and Simeon find themselves in a bind when a mysterious picture book arrives at their doorstep instead of Simeon's Akuzon order! 

Pressed for time, the angels find themselves in deeper trouble when the said book whisks them away in someone's dream...and the only way to get out is...? 

  • A total of 3 endings! 
  • Inspired by Solomon's Demon UR Devilgram, "Candy and a Circus Date"!
  • Light spoilers for Obey Me's main story *

    *this story contains Biblical reinterpretations

***

Creators:
